mapper.select: SELECT r.review, r.score FROM contents c JOIN reviews r ON(c.content_id=r.content_id) WHERE c.writer_id = #{VALUE}

SELECT r2.content_id, r2.avg_score, c2.content_name FROM (SELECT r.content_id content_id, sum(r.score)/count(r.score) avg_score FROM reviews r JOIN contents c ON(r.content_id = c.content_id) WHERE c.content_id = #{VALUE} GROUP BY r.content_id) r2 JOIN contents c2 ON (r2.content_id = c2.content_id)
